mapper.select: select case when (start_time between #{start_time} and #{end_time}) or (end_time between #{start_time} and #{end_time}) or (start_time <= #{start_time} and end_time >= #{end_time}) or (start_time >= #{start_time} and end_time <= #{end_time}) then 'yes' else 'no' end as OverLapping from sandbox.guest.play_bookings where game_id = 1 and booking_date = #{date}
